value:
$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|So. It was you who dispelled
the nightmare.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|You— You're no ljósálfr. Nor are
you of Ljósálfheimr at all!$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|That's right. I am a dökkálfr from
the realm of dark dreams...the dreams
you wish to forget on waking.$k$pI am Triandra. I am Nightmare.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|So you're the one bringing terrible
dreams into Ljósálfheimr!$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Indeed. I am Nightmare. It is who
I am. It is what I must do.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Well...stop it! Don't you feel bad for
all the people you're making suffer?!$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|You are Peony, the Sweet Dream,
are you not? I have heard of you
from Lady Freyja.$k$pYou bring pleasant dreams to the
mortals...my opposite... Only one
thing to do, then.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Lights out.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Lady Freyja's orders are absolute.
I will not be turned away.$k$p$Sbs150|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_HAPPY_01,0|$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|We're here! Look! See? It's great,
isn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|There are...so many beds! Are they
all yours, Peony?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Oh, um. These are beds for
sleeping within dreams. So you
can dream within the dream...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm sorry. I'm confused... If I'm in
a dream already, aren't I already
sleeping too?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|No need to overthink it. Just lie down
and get nice and comfortable.$k$pOnce you do, we can meet King
Freyr...in the dream within the dream.$k$pSo...good night! Sleep tight! See
you soon.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Just saying it's time for sleep
doesn't mean we'll be able to
just fall asleep so easi—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|...ee you soon... Zzz...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sh-Sharena?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We'd all do well to take a lesson
from Sharena's carefree attitude.
Just this once, at least.$k$pGah. Nothing to do but just...sleep!
I'll just settle in, aaaaand...$k$p...Sleep! It's not like I've...*yawn*
...been getting much sleep lately,
so it should be...*yawn*...easy...$k$p...No problem...at... Zzz...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Another job well done!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Something the matter? Do you...
not trust me? Do I seem like a bad
person? Or like I mean you harm?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|No. It's just that...$k$pI trust you. If you were our enemy,
this would be a fine trap, though.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Is it that you're worried about
$Nu, then?$k$pIf that's it, Lord Freyr will be able
to help. I know it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Right...$k$pThere's something that keeps
bothering me, though...and I can't
quite put my finger on what.$k$pSomething...on the edge of memory...
Something from when...*yawn*...I was
a child...$k$pSomething...import...$k$p$EFace_Cool|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Well, for now, sleep tight.$k$pAnd now everyone's asleep. It seems
they all must trust me after all...$k$pOhhh, yay! That makes me so happy!$k$pI must do my best to earn that
trust, and to offer them my trust
in return!$k$pI, Peony, the Sweet Dream, am
here for you now...to bring joy
back to all your dreams.$k$p$Sbs150|
